answers.answer: There is a difference in trailing spaces

source.guidance: Tokens can have different IDs depending upon capitalization and the placement of the token in a phrase.
source.instructions:
**Assume the following phrases:**

```markdown-hide-clipboard
Dogs are the best humans
```

**And:**

```markdown-hide-clipboard
I saw a pack of dogs roaming the street
```

**Why does the word "dogs" have two different token IDs? Select all that apply.**
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT explain why tokens have different IDs
source.name: tokenizer playground
